Node.definition: = action by which humans supervise, direct or oversee work (such as building or repairing) or worship (such as singing or playing instruments)
= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► Levite responsible for temple music and praise in the time of David (דָּוִד)
= a type of song (שִׁיר) probably to be accompanied by musical instruments
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= particle marking a constituent as representing a limited number of entities
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= state in which someone refrains from speaking

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success
= particle marking a constituent as representing a limited number of entities
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
figurative extension of a rock as place of refuge: = deity that protects and provides refuge
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success

Node.gloss: (God as a) stronghold|(God as a) refuge
Node.definition: = a reference to God characterizing him as someone who provides security
literally: to be shaken; hence: = state in which humans are affected by difficult circumstances and feel worried and concerned
= process by which an event happens with great strength or intensity
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y

= referent to an unknown point in time; ► normally used with the purpose of finding out which point in time is intended; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that this point of time may never arrive
meaning unsure; possibly: = action by which humans behave aggressively towards other humans, by which it is unsure whether this is verbal or physical aggression
= causative action by which humans take the life of other humans, whether or not intentionally
= flat construction, ◄ normally made of stone, ► used as a divider of spaces, or to enclose a space
= state in which a relatively straight object is shaped into a curve

= a continuous vertical structure, usually made of natural stones, that encloses or divides an area of land; ≈ associated with security; in some cases used figuratively to denote integrity, which can be negatively affected by sin
= causative action by which someone give another person or object a violent push in a certain direction ► in order to cause that person or object to move away or to fall
= particle marking a constituent as prominent, as if limiting the focus to a restricted number of entities

literally: lifted up = state in which humans or deities have an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified
= action by which humans or deities exercise their minds to determine how they are going to achieve a particular purpose

Node.gloss: to drive out|to cast out|to disperse
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to leave their place or position using force
literally: falsehood; hence: = things that cannot be trusted
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same

= actions by which humans or deities consign other humans or deities or inanimate objects to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, fear, anger, or hostility, or because one was paid to do so; ► the effectiveness of a curse partially depends on the authority of the one pronouncing it
= particle marking a constituent as representing a limited number of entities
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

Node.gloss: to be silent|to keep silent|to remain silent|to be silenced
Node.definition: = to refrain from speaking

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

= state in which humans experience a desire for something to happen, together with a degree of confidence that this desire will be fulfilled through the intervention of someone else; as a result, they are willing to defer taking action for some time
= particle marking a constituent as representing a limited number of entities
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
figurative extension of a rock as place of refuge: = deity that protects and provides refuge
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success

Node.gloss: (God as a) stronghold|(God as a) refuge
Node.definition: = a reference to God characterizing him as someone who provides security
literally: to be shaken; hence: = state in which humans are affected by difficult circumstances and feel worried and concerned
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= a state in which a human or deity helps a human in need to be safe / a safe state
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority
figurative extension of a rock as place of refuge: = deity that protects and provides refuge
= state in which an object is able to withstand force
= person in whom one has put one's trust; ◄ because of difficult circumstances; ► in order to find protection or safety
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= state in which humans have confidence in someone or something else and show that by their actions; ≈ usually regarded as negative when the object is human, always positive when the object is YHWH
literally: at all time; = a long stretch of time, without any interruptions

Node.gloss: to pour out (one's) heart|to pour out (one's) soul
Node.definition: literally: to pour out (one's) inner person (before someone else); hence: = to communicate one's thoughts and emotions to someone else
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= person in whom one has put one's trust; ◄ because of difficult circumstances; ► in order to find protection or safety
= particle marking a constituent as prominent, as if limiting the focus to a restricted number of entities
= state in which a condition does not serve any purpose
= member of a larger group of related people or objects, ◄ referred to as a child of that larger group
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
literally: falsehood; hence: = things that cannot be trusted
= member of a larger group of related people or objects, ◄ referred to as a child of that larger group

= contraption consisting of rod held by a cord in the middle and with pans attached to both ends; ► used for weighing objects; sometimes used figuratively in expressions describing people's status or integrity or the seriousness of a situation in terms of weight
= process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself
= state in which a condition does not serve any purpose
= state in which humans or objects are jointly involved in an event
= state in which humans have confidence in someone or something else and show that by their actions; ≈ usually regarded as negative when the object is human, always positive when the object is YHWH
= action by which humans take property unlawfully from a person or place, usually by force or threat of force
= action by which humans are engaged in activities that do not serve any purpose
= objects that people possess in a relatively large quantity; ≈ greatly valued by the owner, strongly coveted by other people, and a cause of status

Node.gloss: to take to heart|to be concerned about
Node.definition: literally: to put (one's) heart on (something); hence: = to process information in one's mind, often with the intention to act upon it later
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= state in which a person, supernatural being, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
